set(CHROMIUM_BASE_TASK_SCHEDULER_DIR "${CHROMIUM_BASE_DIR}/task_scheduler")

#file_list_remove(CHROMIUM_BASE_TASK_SCHEDULER_SOURCES GLOB "${CHROMIUM_BASE_TASK_SCHEDULER_DIR}/*_mac.cc")

#file_list_remove(CHROMIUM_BASE_TASK_SCHEDULER_SOURCES GLOB "${CHROMIUM_BASE_TASK_SCHEDULER_DIR}/*_fuchsia.cc")

list(APPEND CHROMIUM_BASE_HEADERS ${CHROMIUM_BASE_TASK_SCHEDULER_HEADERS})
